invitations.description: I have been experiencing frequent headaches for the past week.it's becoming unbearable, and i'am worried
I have been Suffering from chronic back pain for a while now, and it's affecting my daily routine
I wake up with a sore throat and difficulty swallowing. it's making it hard for me to eat and drink anything
